welcome.name: Vanessa Giannoni, or just
welcome.slogan: And I'm a builder! Well...something like that

about.description: Hi, I'm Vanessa Giannoni, a passionate full-stack developer with a focus on front-end development. I specialize in creating accessible, inclusive, and scalable projects. As a true team player with strong communication skills, I thrive in collaborative environments. I share my knowledge through my blog and have mentored a team of girls for Technovation Girls Florianópolis 2024. As a speaker, I enjoy inspiring other women by sharing my early career experiences.
about.description_2: When I'm not coding, you'll probably find me studying Go/Baduk (an Asian board game), solving puzzles, watching movies and series, or simply enjoying a good cup of coffee or chimarrão with my family.
